resources.string:
Welcome to the app that will help you fight perfectionsim! 
 
 This app is designed to be simple and effective. Get started by clicking the dots on the upper right corner and selecting Add Note/Goal. From here you have two options, you can either type in your note and or goal using your own format, or you can back out back into the main menu and see that a preformatted note has been added! 
 
This note contains 4 different items. The first is the name of the goal you desire. Then we have the ceiling version of that goal, or rather the best case scenario for accomplishing that goal. Then we have a floor goal, which is the lowest barrier you are willing to accept to consider the goal accomplished. It helps to think of what you might be able to accomplish in regards to this goal during a really difficult and sluggish day. Finally we have a system of 7 boxes which can be used to track your progress for the week. 
 
 Once can simply place an x in the boxes such as follows: [x ] [x] [x ] [x] [ ] [] [ ] 
 
 Remember that regardless if you hit a ceiling or floor objective, you check a box. It is all about consistency. 
 
 Example of goal 
 
 Goal: Do some more reading! 
 
 Ceiling Objective: Read 20 pages in the morning and at night 
 
 Floor Objective: Read 10 pages at least 
 
 [x ] [x] [x ] [x] [x ] [] [ ] 
 
 Enjoy, and happy habit building!
